name: Articles demandés non consultés par fabricant
query:
select 
	mr.name as "Fabricant:Data:180",
	@total :=(select count(*) from `tabMaterial Request Item` sqi5 where sqi5.fabricant=mr.name and sqi5.docstatus=1 and sqi5.consulted=0) as "Non consulte:Data:200",
	(select count(*) from `tabMaterial Request Item` sqi5 where sqi5.fabricant=mr.name and sqi5.docstatus=1) as "Nombre total:Data:200"


from
	`tabManufacturer` as mr
report_name: Articles demandés non consultés par fabricant
